Reference

All functions

calc_gene_cor_before_after_deconv()

calculate expression of loci to specific genes before and after TME deconvolution

cis_em_genomic()

Get candidates non-promoter cis regulation

cis_em_promoters()

Get candidates for promoters that are regulated by methylation in cis

cluster_em_cross_cor()

Cluster Expression-methylation cross-correlation

coord_to_promoter_names()

Change rownames of matrix from coordinates to promoter names

deconv_TME()

Deconvolute TME (tumor microenvironment) effects from methylation data

em_cross_cor()

Calculate Expression-methylation cross-correlation

export_em_cross_mods()

Export Expression-methylation cross-correlation clustering to excel sheet

feats_to_knn_matrix()

Calculate knn-matrix based on feature matrix

gene_promoter_cors()

Get correlations of all promoters to a specific gene

get_TME_genes()

Extract TME genes from methylation expression clustering

immune_cafs_signature_from_clust()

Define immune and CAF signatures

intervs_to_mat()

Transform an intervals set to matrix

mat_to_intervs()

Transform a matrix with coordinate rownames to intervals set

normalize_immune_cafs_meth()

Normalize methylation matrix for immune and CAF signatures

normalize_mat_knn()

Normalize matrix using knn-matrix

plot_em_cross_cor()

Plot clustered Expression-methylation cross-correlation matrix

plot_norm_vs_raw_gene_scatter()

Plot scatter of raw expression-methylation correaltion vs normalized for specific genes

shuffle_each_column()

Shuffles each column of a numeric matrix
